name: Bounty Cats: Shock and Paw
description:
Use your C.A.T.S. (Combat-Assistive Tactical Sentience) to defeat enemies and solve puzzles to track down your target.

Created in a week for the 2019 Epic MegaJam.

Gamepad highly recommended!

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left Thumbstick - Move
  • Right Thumbstick - Aim
  • Right Trigger - Fire Suppression Rifle
  • Left Bumper - Launch Left Cat
  • Right Bumper - Launch Right Cat
  • Y - Recall Cats

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Arrow Keys - Aim
  • Space Bar - Fire Suppression Rifle
  • Left CTRL - Launch Left Cat
  • Left ALT - Launch Right Cat
  • Z - Recall Cats
